entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:14 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
